name: @wallet/provider-url-service
description: Serves 3rd party URLs with API keys and relevant signatures
author: Celo

scripts.deploy-providerUrl:prod: firebase use prod && yarn update-firebase-prod-config && firebase deploy --only functions:composeCicoProviderUrl
scripts.deploy-providerUrl:staging: firebase use staging && yarn update-firebase-staging-config && firebase deploy --only functions:composeCicoProviderUrl
scripts.deploy-ipAddress:prod: firebase use prod && yarn update-firebase-prod-config && firebase deploy --only functions:determineIpAddressLocation
scripts.deploy-ipAddress:staging: firebase use staging && yarn update-firebase-staging-config && firebase deploy --only functions:determineIpAddressLocation
